MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L6 and L7 postcode areas of Liverpool, affecting properties in Onslow Road, Kelso Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.45PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of severe damage to one of our underground junction boxes and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.17PM on 31st January 2021.
